# main.js
/// <reference types="./main.d.ts" />

export { A } from "./a.js";
export const foo = 1;

# main.d.ts
/// <reference path="npm:@types/node" />

export { A } from "./a.js";
export const foo: number;

# a.js
/** other comment first /// */ /// <reference types="./a.d.ts" />

export class A {
  foo = 1;
}

# a.d.ts
export class A {
  foo: number;
}

# jsr.json
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./main.js"
  }
}

# output
== /a.d.ts ==
export class A {
  foo: number;
}

== /a.js ==
/** other comment first /// */ 

export class A {
  foo = 1;
}

== /jsr.json ==
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./main.js"
  }
}

== /main.d.ts ==
/// <reference path="@types/node" />

export { A } from "./a.d.ts";
export const foo: number;

== /main.js ==


export { A } from "./a.js";
export const foo = 1;

== /package.json ==
{
  "name": "@jsr/scope__foo",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "homepage": "http://jsr.test/@scope/foo",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {},
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./main.d.ts",
      "default": "./main.js"
    }
  },
  "_jsr_revision": 0
}
